languages.text: {n}Едва заметный жест от проктора, и Глейто напрыгивает на пленника и начинает трепать его руку. Слышен хруст кости и треск разрываемой плоти, но вопли предателя полны не боли, а ужаса — всепоглощающего страха перед живым оружием Лекс Империалис, не ведающим жалости.{/n}

{n}At a barely noticeable gesture from the Proctor, Glaito lunges at the prisoner, bites down, and starts violently shaking his arm. You hear the man's bones break and his flesh tear apart, but his screams are filled with horror rather than pain — so overpowering is his fear of this living weapon of the Lex Imperialis that knows no pity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Едва заметный жест от проктора, и Глейто напрыгивает на пленника и начинает трепать его руку. Слышен хруст кости и треск разрываемой плоти, но вопли предателя полны не боли, а ужаса — всепоглощающего страха перед живым оружием Лекс Империалис, не ведающим жалости.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A barely noticeable gesture from the Proctor — and Glaito lunges at the prisoner, bites down, and starts shaking his arm violently. You hear the man's bones breaking and his flesh tearing apart, but his screams are filled with horror rather than pain — so overpowering is his fear of the living weapon of the Lex Imperialis that knows no pity.{/n}

You hear the man's bones break and his flesh tear apart, but his screams are filled with horror rather than pain — so overpowering is his fear of this living weapon of the Lex Imperialis that knows no pity.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙做了个微不可察的手势。格雷托猛地扑向了那个犯人，一口咬了下去，用力撕扯着犯人的手臂。你听到这个人的皮肉被撕裂的声音，夹杂着骨头碎裂的声音。犯人放声尖叫，不是出于剧痛，而是出于恐惧。这台由血肉构成的杀戮武器没有一丝怜悯，犯人被吓破了胆。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At a barely noticeable gesture from the Proctor, Glaito lunges at the prisoner, bites down, and starts violently shaking his arm. You hear the man's bones break and his flesh tear apart, but his screams are filled with horror rather than pain — so overpowering is his fear of this living weapon of the Lex Imperialis that knows no pity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙做了个微不可察的手势。格雷托猛地扑向了那个犯人，一口咬了下去，用力撕扯着犯人的手臂。你听到这个人的皮肉被撕裂的声音，夹杂着骨头碎裂的声音。犯人放声尖叫，不是出于剧痛，而是出于恐惧。这台由血肉构成的杀戮武器没有一丝怜悯，犯人被吓破了胆。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con un gesto apenas perceptible de su Procurador, Glaito se abalanza sobre el prisionero, muerde su brazo y empieza a agitarlo con violencia. Oyes el crujido de los huesos rotos y el sonido de la carne desgarrada, pero sus gritos no son de dolor, sino de terror, tal es su miedo hacia el arma viviente de la Lex Imperialis, ajena a toda piedad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At a barely noticeable gesture from the Proctor, Glaito lunges at the prisoner, bites down, and starts violently shaking his arm. You hear the man's bones break and his flesh tear apart, but his screams are filled with horror rather than pain — so overpowering is his fear of this living weapon of the Lex Imperialis that knows no pity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un gesto apenas perceptible de su Procurador, Glaito se abalanza sobre el prisionero, muerde su brazo y empieza a agitarlo con violencia. Oyes el crujido de los huesos rotos y el sonido de la carne desgarrada, pero sus gritos no son de dolor, sino de terror, tal es su miedo hacia el arma viviente de la Lex Imperialis, ajena a toda piedad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le proctor effectue un mouvement quasiment imperceptible et Glaito fond sur le prisonnier, referme sa mâchoire sur son bras et s'empresse de l'agiter violemment. Vous entendez les os de l'homme se briser et sa chair se déchirer, mais ses hurlements sont davantage teintés d'horreur que de douleur, tant il est terrifié par cette impitoyable arme vivante de la Lex Imperialis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At a barely noticeable gesture from the Proctor, Glaito lunges at the prisoner, bites down, and starts violently shaking his arm. You hear the man's bones break and his flesh tear apart, but his screams are filled with horror rather than pain — so overpowering is his fear of this living weapon of the Lex Imperialis that knows no pity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le proctor effectue un mouvement quasiment imperceptible et Glaito fond sur le prisonnier, referme sa mâchoire sur son bras et s'empresse de l'agiter violemment. Vous entendez les os de l'homme se briser et sa chair se déchirer, mais ses hurlements sont davantage teintés d'horreur que de douleur, tant il est terrifié par cette impitoyable arme vivante de la Lex Imperialis.{/n}

languages.text: {n}代理人がほとんど気づかれないほどの小さなジェスチャーを送ると、グライトは囚人に飛びかかり、腕にかみついて激しく揺さぶり始めた。男の骨が砕け、肉が引き裂かれる音が聞こえたが、彼の悲鳴は痛みよりも恐怖に満ちていた。なぜなら、慈悲を知らぬレックス・インペリアの生ける武器に対する圧倒的な恐怖が、彼を支配していたからだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At a barely noticeable gesture from the Proctor, Glaito lunges at the prisoner, bites down, and starts violently shaking his arm. You hear the man's bones break and his flesh tear apart, but his screams are filled with horror rather than pain — so overpowering is his fear of this living weapon of the Lex Imperialis that knows no pity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}代理人がほとんど気づかれないほどの小さなジェスチャーを送ると、グライトは囚人に飛びかかり、腕にかみついて激しく揺さぶり始めた。男の骨が砕け、肉が引き裂かれる音が聞こえたが、彼の悲鳴は痛みよりも恐怖に満ちていた。なぜなら、慈悲を知らぬレックス・インペリアの生ける武器に対する圧倒的な恐怖が、彼を支配していたからだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Üsteğmen'in zar zor fark edilen bir işareti üzerine Glaito; mahkuma atılıyor, onu ısırıyor ve kolunu şiddetle sallamaya başlıyor. Adamın kemiklerinin kırıldığını ve etinin parçalandığını duyuyorsun ama çığlıkları acıdan çok dehşetle dolu. Lex İmperialis'in acıma bilmeyen bu canlı silahına duyduğu korku çok baskın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At a barely noticeable gesture from the Proctor, Glaito lunges at the prisoner, bites down, and starts violently shaking his arm. You hear the man's bones break and his flesh tear apart, but his screams are filled with horror rather than pain — so overpowering is his fear of this living weapon of the Lex Imperialis that knows no pity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Üsteğmen'den zar zor fark edilen bir işaretle Glaito, mahkuma atılıyor, ısırıyor ve kolunu şiddetle sallamaya başlıyor. Adamın kemiklerinin kırıldığını ve etinin parçalandığını duyuyorsun ama çığlıkları acıdan çok dehşetle dolu. Lex Imperialis'in acıma bilmeyen bu canlı silahına duyduğu korku o kadar baskın ki.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auf eine kaum wahrnehmbare Geste des Proktors hin stürzt Glaito sich auf den Gefangenen, beißt zu und schüttelt wild dessen Arm. Du hörst, wie die Knochen des Mannes brechen und sein Fleisch aufreißt, aber seine Schreie künden eher von Angst als von Schmerz – so überwältigend ist seine Furcht vor dieser lebenden Waffe des Lex Imperia, die keine Gnade kennt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At a barely noticeable gesture from the Proctor, Glaito lunges at the prisoner, bites down, and starts violently shaking his arm. You hear the man's bones break and his flesh tear apart, but his screams are filled with horror rather than pain — so overpowering is his fear of this living weapon of the Lex Imperialis that knows no pity.{/n}
